title: Putting visualization to work: ProgramFinder for youth placement
proctitle: CHI '97: Proceedings of the ACM SIGCHI Conference on Human factors in computing systems

authors.name: Jason B. Ellis

references.text: Ahlberg, C., Shneiderman, B. (1993)"'Visual Information Seeking: Tight coupling of dynamic query filters with starfield displays," A CM CHI 94 Conference Proc. (Boston, MA, April 24-2& 1994), 313-317. Also appears in Readings in Human- Computer Interaction: Toward the Year 2000, Baeker, R.M., Gruden, J., Buxton, W.A.S. & Greenberg, S., Eds., Morgan Kaufmann Pubs., inc., (1995), 450-456.

Rose, A., Shneiderman, B., Plaisant, C. (1995) "An applied ethnographic method for redesigning user interfaces," A CM Proc. of DIS '95, Symposium on Designing Interactive Systems: Processes, Practices, Methods & Techniques (Ann Arbor, MI, Aug 23-25, 1995), 115-122.

Slaughter, L., Norman, K., Shneiderman, B., (1995), "Assessing Users' Subjective Satisfaction with the Information System for Youth Services (ISYS)," Proceedings of Third Annual Mid- Atlantic Human Factors Conference (Blacksburg, VA, March 26-28, 1995), 164-170.

Williamson, C., Shneiderman, B. (1992) "The dynamic HomeFinder: Evaluating dynamic queries in a real-estate information exploration system," Proceedings A CM SIGIR '92 (Copenhagen, June 21-24, 1992), 338-346.
